item.description:
Hi Everyone,

I know it's last-minute but let's climb! Start the week off right. Come on, have some fun - just because you deserve it.

Please note, you will need to pass a belay test if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You should also take a class at Metrorock if you have never climbed before. Please call the gym in advance to make arrangements. Metrorock will charge you $16 for a daypass if you are not already a member or a punch card holder. For more information see:

http://www.metrorock....

The gym also has a shuttle to the gym from the T - the Orange Line Wellington Station - if you don't have a car.

See you there!
Kevin
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wait at the picnic table for a few minutes; after 7:30, find me climbing.
item.name: Monday Night Climb
